document.docAuthor: Dikow, Torsten & Londt, J. G. H.
document.masterDocTitle: A review of Lamyra Loew (Diptera: Asilidae: Laphriinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of Lamyra Loew (Diptera: Asilidae: Laphriinae)

subSubSection.paragraph: It is unnecessary to redescribe this species as Hull (1962) provided a detailed description.
